Notes: Interest Free for the first £200 overdrawn balance.
£20 per item, max 1 item per day. This fee forms part of the calculation of the £90 monthly cap on unarranged overdraft charges in a charging period.
This fee is for the use of an Arranged Overdraft and will be charged once per charging period if an account goes more than £15 into an arranged overdraft at least once during the charging period.

£7 per day that an account balance is in an unarranged overdarft position by more than £15. This fee forms part of the calculation of the £90 monthly cap on unarranged overdraft charges in a charging period.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: This account is available as a sole account to new and existing customers aged 18 years and over who are a full time third-level university or college student or a student nurse. Students on full time vocational courses at regional colleges may also apply.

CoreProduct.ProductDescription: Customers who have graduated from a full time third level course within the last two years. A customer can only hold a graduate account for one period of three years.
